title: Athletism — Striking (Elite) — Phase 10: Peak & Performance Maintenance
equipment: Heavy bag, pads, focus mitts, kick shield
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Protective gear (gloves, wraps, shin guards, mouthpiece)
goal: Micro-dose intensity, CNS freshness, express power.

main: Strength: 2x2 clean pulls light + MB rotational throw
cooldown: Soft tissue release 10' (foam roll, lacrosse ball)

notes: Week 1: one rehearsal + one primer. Week 2: fight week taper.
